t: KURT VILE - BOTTLE IT IN | Amazon.com.au | Music
s: Kurt's music will grow on you. His singing reminds me a bit of Neil Young. His guitar playing is second to none- ... Durchgehend hörenswerte Songs!! ... I didn't think it could get better than his last album. Lots of self reflection on aging, relationships in his experimental rock style. It's such a great album. Glad I snagged this one on vinyl...

t: Kurt Vile
s: Having been the subject and willing conspirator of many intentional lies planted in Sonic Youth bios over the years, I know first hand the way album lore can bend reality to its truth. After the infamous Byron Coley originated the SY "Trilogy" myth in the Murray Street bio, we had no choice ...

t: KURT VILE - Hunchback - Amazon.com Music
s: Fans of Kurt Vile's previous work cried into their pillows and accused him of selling out the bedroom rock scene, while the initiated few knew he'd been doing it for years... plugging in with a full-on rock band called the Violators and gigging in all corners of Philly.
